infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Naps needs camera access to capture and share moments with your friends.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Naps needs microphone access to record audio for your posts and stories.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Naps uses your location to show nearby friends and location-based content.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Naps needs access to your contacts to help you find and connect with friends.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Naps needs access to save photos and videos to your library.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Naps needs access to your photo library to share photos and videos.

plugins.cameraPermission: Naps needs camera access to capture and share moments with your friends.
plugins.microphonePermission: Naps needs microphone access to record audio for your posts and stories.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Naps uses your location to show nearby friends and location-based content.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Naps uses your location to show nearby friends and location-based content.

plugins.photosPermission: Naps needs access to your photo library to share photos and videos.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Naps needs access to save photos and videos to your library.

plugins.contactsPermission: Naps needs access to your contacts to help you find and connect with friends.
